channel.title: CVE Feed for Axis Communications AB -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Axis Communications AB -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-0054|2024-03-19T06:35:22.028Z -- Axis Communications AB -- AXIS OS
item.description: Sandro Poppi, member of the AXIS OS Bug Bounty Program, has found that the VAPIX APIs local_list.cgi, create_overlay.cgi and irissetup.cgiÂ was vulnerable for file globbing which could lead to a resource exhaustion attack. Axis has released patched AXIS OS versions for the highlighted flaw. Please refer to the Axis security advisory for more information and solution.

item.title: CVE-2024-0055|2024-03-19T06:39:24.100Z -- Axis Communications AB -- AXIS OS
item.description: Sandro Poppi, member of the AXIS OS Bug Bounty Program, has found that the VAPIX APIs mediaclip.cgi and playclip.cgi was vulnerable for file globbing which could lead to a resource exhaustion attack. Axis has released patched AXIS OS versions for the highlighted flaw. Please refer to the Axis security advisory for more information and solution.
